title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: On the iSeries platform using the JTOpen JDBC drivers, the tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system, which can be several hundred tables. Even with the schema filter feature implemented in the code from CVS dated 6/30/05, there is still a warning message on load because the tree is being populated upon load.
EB: The loading of the tree should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
